landing.bio: I am a 3rd year B. Tech Computer Science student currently studying at PES University with a good academic record and a keen interest in the field of software development, Networking, Cloud Computing, and I have practical experience in various technologies of the IT field. I am very passionate to share my knowledge and help other people.

experience.organization: Center for Data Science and Applied Machine Learning
experience.aboutWork: Built a system which streams the twitter tweets in real-time and detects the topic based on the same.

experience.organization: Center for Cloud Computing and Big Data
experience.aboutWork: Working on the federation of clouds using OpenStack

interests.paragraphOne: I am very fond of reading programming books, most of my free time is spent on that.
interests.paragraphTwo: I write articles on medium and geeksforgeeks. I like playing cricket and watching movies.
